title: Brothers Manakia - Pioneers of Greek and Balkan Cinema
brief_description: This film traces the history of Yannis and Miltos Manakia, beginning at their place of birth, the Macedonian village of Abdela, where the first Greek film “The Weavers” was made by the Manakia brothers in 1905, laying the foundations of the Greek and Balkan Cinema.
